summary: AT 57,000 MI MY 1998 CHEVROLET VENTURE DEVELOPED A COOLANT LEAK AT THE INTAKE MANIFOLD ON THE DRIVERS SIDE OF THE ENGINE. I WAS QUOTED A $500.00 ESTIMATE TO REPLACE THE $3.00 GASKET AND THE MECHANIC AT THE DEALERSHIP STATED THAT HE SEES A LOT OF THESE LEAKS AND THAT THIS IS VERY COMMON.         TS
